reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan fits true to size and appreciate its lightweight, smooth fabric.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fresh and comfortable
items.body: I loved this shawl. The fabric is soft, light, and delicate to the touch. The color is very original and pairs perfectly with jeans or casual pants—great for everyday wear or semi-formal outings. I especially appreciate its generous width, which makes it very comfortable for those of us with broader arms. As for care, just wash it on a delicate cycle; using the dryer is optional. Overall, the price-quality ratio seems fair for such a useful and versatile piece. Read more
items.author: fiorella guzman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely colored like the picture
items.body: Fit great color is true to photo nice light weight material Read more
items.author: Destiny

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Size Down for Fitted Look
items.body: This cardigan is definitely comfortable & the fit was ok. If you want a more fitted look, size down. I was a little disappointed that it was a more cotton-y fabric & less of a knit. Love the pockets in front. Overall, pretty cute & good quality. It's also quite lightweight, so nice to wear in slightly warmer weather too. :) Read more
items.author: Elaine Davis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars warm enough to head off a chill
items.body: I purchased a green one and it is so comfortable. I have several similar to this style but they are long. I wanted a shorter one for a particular pair of harem pants. This was perfect color. The fabric is a t-shirt type of fabric and it feels butter soft. It is really a nice casual style. I wore it in the sun in 77 degree Florida weather and it was fine. I think I could wear this year around in Florida. For those who do not live in Florida as I lived in the North previously - I would say that this would be a great piece for late Spring, Summer and cool Summer evenings, and early Fall. I could see this being tucked into a bag to go out to the beach for a quick cover up, slung over a purse when going for a casual night out and using this instead of a sweater... I could see this in an office setting as I think that depending on what top and pants or skirt you are wearing it could be dressed up easily. I plan on wearing it for casual. It is an easy piece to wear. The pockets are placed nicely on each side, but I would not plan on putting your phone or anything heavy in the pockets. The fabric is too 'swingy' and t-shirt like so anything heavy would pull the pockets and evenually it would be longer on one side then the other. Your hands, or light set of keys, pocket of hard candy, or tissues would be fine in these pockets. I find the quality is great, I could see that it is warm enough to head off a chill and I believe I find value for my money and would puchase another in the future. Read more
items.author: April Colon

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Black Cardigan
items.body: I love the fit and material of this cardigan. I have it in several colors. However the black one has a strong odor that I keep trying to wash out. I don’t know if it’s the dye or what. It smells like a 80’s home perm. No one wants to smell like that. Read more
items.author: Ronnet McIntire

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cardigan/sweater
items.body: This cardigan/sweater is not what you typically think of when you hear cardigan or sweater. It is made like a cardigan/sweater, but the material which it is made of is more like a tee shirt material. It will be perfect for a little warmth when going into an air conditioned restaurant or store on a hot day. Or wearing in the evening after the sun goes down on a warmer day. If you want something to wear for the warmth, this is not going to do the job. However, I find this cardigan/sweater to be perfect for Spring thru fall. I love the softness of it, the color (dark green) is vibrant. It came in a vacuum packed plastic bag. So yes, it was wrinkled. However wrinkle relaxer spray took them out. There was no stench when I opened the package. I plan to buy other colors of this sweater. I absolutely love the style, color and weight of this sweater. And the pockets are a HUGE plus! In my opinion, this is a staple for every woman’s wardrobe! Read more
items.author: Bradlo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks Nice
items.body: Love this! It is lightweight and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Lisa B

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Black ones smell terrible.
items.body: I had one black , a navy, green, etc. I hadn’t washed any of them yet. I ordered a second black one because I really liked the first black one I bought. When I got it I decided to wash them both, along with the other colored ones. Omg, the black ones smelled so bad, but the other colors had no smell. All were washed together. I’ve tried soaking them both in vinegar, didn’t take smell away. Then I did a baking soda soak…no smell removed. Hung outside for days….still smell horrible. I’d like money back, I can’t wear them or be in same room with them. It’s not just me, either. Help! Read more
items.author: marg

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Long Sleeve A18-xiao Red Grid, Long Sleeve A17-light Blue, Short Sleeve B06-purple, Long Sleeve A12-caramel, Long Sleeve A03-mauve, Long Sleeve A06-white, Long Sleeve A08-dark Green, Long Sleeve A07-red, Long Sleeve A15-army Green, Long Sleeve A05-purple, Short Sleeve B03-mauve, Long Sleeve A04-wine Red, Short Sleeve B09-bright Green, Short Sleeve B07-pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
